siyam maha nikaye asgiri wihara parshawaye maha nayaka agga maha panditha athipujya udugama shri buddharakkhitha maha nayaka swamindrayan wahansege 85 wana janma dinaya adata (17) yedi atha.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha unwahanseta subasiri pathamin mese kiyayi.pura hata nawa wasarak mululle shri sambuddha shasanaye chirasthithiya patha siyalu nikayanhi gaurawaniya wu maha sangaruwana samagin ekwa harawath yamak samajayata dayada karannata asgiri mahanayaka mahimipanan wahanse nirantharayen ganna uthsahaya agaya kala yuthu bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.jathiye namayen, rate anagatha parapure namayen shri wibhuthiya udesa karanu labana jathika karthawyayanwaladi ee sthanayan kara thaman wahansege sharira saukhya gana da nosithamin asgiri mahanahimiyan wadama kara aashirwadayan ek kirima, thaman parama pujaniyathwayen apeksha karana asirimath diriyak bawa janadhipathithuma awadharanaya kara siti.janadhipathithuma me bawa sandahan kara sitinne, maha wihara wanshika syamopali maha nikaye asgiri parshwaye mahanayaka, asgiri maha wiharaya, wijayasundararamaya, rangiri dambaulu rajamaha wiharaya yana wiharathrayadhipathi, mahopadhyaya, aggamaha panditha athigaurawarha udugama shri dhammadassi rathanapala buddharakkhithabhidhana mahanayaka maha swamindrayanan wahansege adata (17) yedena 84 weni janma dinaya nimiththen shubhashinsana paniwudayak nikuth karamini.dashaka thunak purawata giniganimin biyen alali giya deshaya, in mudagena sathara digbhagayema wesena siyalu jathinta nidahaswa niwahalwa wasaya karannata awasi parisaraya udakara ganima sandaha thaman wisin diyath kala wu ee dawantha wadapiliwelata asgiri mahanahimiyan wahanse nirantharayen aashirwada pala kirimath, thamanwa dirimath kirimath pin sith peradariwa sihipath karana bawa janadhipathithumage shubhashinsana paniwudaye wadiduratath sandahan we.daham danumen paripurnawa, dana ugath helaye maha pandiruwanak lesin ape mahanayaka mahimipanan wahanse, mathu sanga parapurata denu labana uthum aadarshaya wachanayen kiya nima kala nohaki tharam agana bawath janadhipathithuma sandahan kara siti.“minisa bhauthika washayen pamanakma nowa, aadhyathmika washayen da godanagima sandaha pudgalayata shraddhawa menma pragnyawa da laba diya yuthuya” yanna thema kara ganimin mita wasara nawayakata perathuwa me rate anagatha surakshithathawayath, silwath sadu jana samajayath athi karalima wenuwen thaman dutu ee suba sihinaya yatharthayak kara ganima sandaha samawitama asgiri mahanahimiyan wahansegen lada awawada anushasana maha pitiwahalak wu bawa samastha jathiye ma uththunga pujopaharayak pirinamamin janadhipathithuma siya shubhashinsana paniwudaya osse sihipath kara siti..
